dcterms:creator: Cynthia McCollough
dcterms:description: The dataset consists of nine sets of real projection data acquired in helical CT, which were rebinned to 360° angular scan fan-beam CT. The dataset includes 512 × 512 artifact-free images reconstructed using full-angle fan-beam projection data, with limited angle experiments using only 120° or 150° angular scans.
dcterms:title: AAPM Low-Dose CT Grand Challenge
